full_summary:
# Rooms for Proposal: Microwave Link Services

## Overview
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the provision of Non-terrestrial Internet Microwave Services.

## Details
* **Contract Number**: PW-22-01007657
* **Solicitation Number**: W6399-22-LJ93/A
* **Publication Date**: 20 September 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: 07 October 2022 at 14:00
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Notice of Amendment
Four (4) amendments have been issued to the Request for Proposal document. Bidders are invited to review these amendments prior to submitting their proposals.

* **Amendment 1**: Correction to the closing date.
* **Amendment 2**: Response to the first set of questions received from bidders.
* **Amendment 3**: Revised response to questions raised in Amendment 2.
* **Amendment 4**: Additional document to support the proposal.

## Clarification of Scope
The Department of National Defence requires a Non-terrestrial Internet Microwave System to ensure network connectivity is available in the event of an outage.

## Relevant Documents
The following documents are relevant to the tender process:

* RFP Document
* RFP Amendment 1
* RFP Amendment 2
* RFP Amendment 3
* RFP Amendment 4
* NPP Document (Canadian Free Trade Agreement)
* QA 1 Response
* QA 2 Response

## Industry Classification
* GSIN Code: D304A (Data Transmission Service)
* UNSPSC Code: None

## Trade Agreements
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.

## Contact Information
* **Name**: Angelina Costain
* **Email**: angelina.costain@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (613) 990-4939

## Language Requirements
Both English and French should be used in the proposal.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria
The Tender Evaluation Criteria will be outlined in the RFP Document.

## Attachment
The attachment includes the relevant documents listed above. You can access the files through the link below:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/20/643c5ad7ecb9fe245e7dde0ddda071a1/w6399-22-lj93_npp_bilingual.pdf
